## Description {#details}

A specification for a virtual function call with all constant integer arguments.

This is used to perform virtual constant propagation on the summary.

Definition at line 744 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/modulesummaryindex-h">ModuleSummaryIndex.h</a>.
